original_text: It is not right for me to decide about people who do not belong to the church group. God will judge those people. But you should decide what is right for the people who do belong to your group. Do what the Bible says:
korean_text: 밖에 있는 사람들은 하나님이 심판하시려니와 이 악한 사람은 너희 중에서 내쫓으라

sentences.original_text: It is not right for me to decide
about people who do not belong to the church group
sentences.korean_translation: 교회 그룹에 속하지 않는 사람들에 대해서는

sentences.original_text: what is right for the people
who do belong to your group
